text: You're safe now. It looks like she's left us alone.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: How did someone your age get all the way up here? We should be getting you home.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: I can never go home now...
speaker: zatt_despair

text: ...not that I'd really want to if I could.
speaker: zatt_sad

text: I failed as a warrior. I couldn't drive away the Shadow Queen, unlike you. Your mystic artes are so powerful.
speaker: zatt_sad

text: Warrior? Mystic Artes? What are you talking about?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Aren't you a warrior? Don't you protect us from demons that wander the earth?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: We're not on the Earth; we're on the Moon!
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Didn't you see me align the Satellite Laser just now? I protect real-estate from Lunarbeasts.
speaker: protag_neutral
